name: Blaster Run
description:
Blaster Run is an endless 2D action runner game.

Equipped with a powerful blaster, your mission is to survive and explore worlds. Each world has different monsters and obstacles.
On your run, you are going to encounter warrior skeletons, mages and orcs. Use your blaster to destroy every creature!
Unleash your extreme runner skills to dodge razor sharp obstacles and find a portal to a new world !

FEATURES :

★Unlock 4 unique powerful Blasters !

★ Run through multiple worlds !

★ Upgrade your set of power-ups !

★ Shoot evil mages, warriors and orcs !

★ Dodge sharp obstacles !

★ Download Blaster Run now and dive into the endless adventure ! ★
